item.title: What Senior Engineers Need to Know About AI Coding Tools
item.author: Marc Grabanski

summary: Foundation evidence for AI coding tools integration, addressing the technique gap for senior engineers.
findings: Senior engineers often report worse results due to technique gaps, not aptitude.
Prompt specificity and context management are critical engineering skills.
Zero-shot-CoT (Let's think step by step) can significantly improve results.
MCP provides a safe path for agent tool integration.
